context_history.content: I want to learn about: css. DO NOT greet me. Immediately start lesson Step 1 by explaining the core concept on the whiteboard.

CSS, or Cascading Style Sheets, is the language used to style the visual presentation of a web page. It works by separating the content (HTML) from the design, allowing you to control colors, fonts, and layouts across multiple pages simultaneously.

visual_content.detail: HTML (Structure), CSS (Presentation), Final Webpage, CSS applies rules to the HTML structure to create the visual design.
